name: Gravity Blade Raging Tiger

trigger.text: Place up to one cost 5 or less character on the bottom of its owner's deck.

text: Main: Place up to 2 cost 6 or less characters in any order on the bottom of their owner's deck. Trigger: Place up to one cost 5 or less character on the bottom of its owner's deck.

effect.text: Place up to 2 cost 6 or less characters in any order on the bottom of their owner's deck.
Place up to one cost 5 or less character on the bottom of its owner's deck.
